results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers induced when A118306 is restricted to A007310.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: A118306(n) = { if(1==n, 1, my(f = factor(n)); my(d = (-1)^primepi(f[1, 1])); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = prime(primepi(f[i, 1])-d)); factorback(f)); };
A126760(n) = {n&&n\=3^valuation(n, 3)<<valuation(n, 2); n%3+n\6*2}; \\ From _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 19 2016
xref: Cf. A277908, A277909, A277910 (for "almost fixed points"), also A277907.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 05 2016
